alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 19 at 2:51PM EST until November 21 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, with the highest amounts in far southwestern Hamilton County and northwestern Fulton County. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Hamilton and Northern Fulton Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 4 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Snow covered roadways and low visibility will make for slippery and hazardous travel. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow rates may reach around one inch per hour within the strongest bands, mainly on Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
